channel.title: Build Your Own Botnet - Web App
channel.description: I made a web GUI for the BYOB (Build Your Own Botnet) project - what do you guys think? You can check out a preview at https://buildyourownbotnet.com or get the code on GitHub at https://github.com/malwaredllc/byob.

item.title: Build Your Own Botnet - Web App
item.dc:creator: colental
item.description:
Nice, let me know if you encounter any issues, as there are likely some outstanding bugs in the web GUI as it is very new. The console based application is more stable at the moment.
